snippet.title: Smells Like a Mushroom | RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
𝕊𝕄𝔼𝕃𝕃𝕊 𝕃𝕀𝕂𝔼 𝔸 𝕄𝕌𝕊ℍℝ𝕆𝕆𝕄 𝕀𝕊 ℕ𝕆𝕎 𝕆𝕌𝕋 𝕆ℕ ℙℂ! 🥳
🔹𝐒𝐦𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐬 𝐋𝐢𝐤𝐞 𝐚 𝐌𝐮𝐬𝐡𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐦 (Steam) 👉 https://bit.ly/SLAM_Steam

🎮 𝐀𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐆𝐚𝐦𝐞 🎮
𝐁𝐨𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐫 𝐉𝐨𝐤𝐞𝐬 ✅ 𝐕𝐞𝐠𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐏𝐮𝐧𝐬 ✅ 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬 ✅ 
Join the Aveggers to fight through the solar system in a dynamic third-person platformer shooter and defeat the alien mushroom invasion... 𝟗𝟗% 𝐬𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐲, 𝟏𝟎𝟎% 𝐯𝐞𝐠𝐚𝐧! 🥦

𝔹𝕌𝕐 𝕀𝕋 ℕ𝕆𝕎 𝕆ℕ:
📌 STEAM 👉 https://bit.ly/SLAM_Steam (𝘋𝘦𝘮𝘰 𝘪𝘴 𝘢𝘷𝘢𝘪𝘭𝘢𝘣𝘭𝘦!)

Parasitic mushrooms invaded from space, spreading all over the Milky Way. Since humans are long extinct and vegetables rule the Earth, it shouldn’t really be 𝐘𝐎𝐔𝐑 problem anymore. 🤭
Except that you’ve got to suspend your disbelief, because somehow 𝐲𝐨𝐮’𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐰𝐡𝐨 𝐡𝐚𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐩 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐢𝐧𝐯𝐚𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧. Surprise! 🥕

OUT:
💻 𝕆𝕌𝕋 ℕ𝕆𝕎! - PC
🎮 15.11.2024 -  CONSOLES 

🔸ᴅᴇᴠᴇʟᴏᴘᴇʀ: Red Limb Studio
🔸ᴘᴜʙʟɪꜱʜᴇʀ: Fatal Error, Destructive Creations

🔗 𝐔𝐬𝐞𝐟𝐮𝐥 𝐋𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐬 🔗
📌 https://bit.ly/SLaM_PressKit
📌 https://destructivecreations.com/
📌 https://www.redlimbstudio.com/
📌 https://www.facebook.com/destructivecreationsteam/
📌 https://discord.com/invite/QdTdNQ96G5

ʜᴀꜱʜᴛᴀɢꜱ:
#SmellsLikeaMushroom #3DPlatformer #LooterShooter
